meanings.definition: Providing or relating to views of impressive or beautiful natural scenery.
meanings.sent1: The scenic mountains took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The scenic route along the coast is breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The scenic picnic spot was so beautiful that even the birds stopped to admire it.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings captured the scenic beauty of the countryside like a photograph.
meanings.sent5: The scenic view from the top of the hill was etched in my memory forever.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the visual aspect of a place or scene.
meanings.sent1: The scenic postcard showcased the city's beauty.
meanings.sent2: The scenic design of the play added to its charm.
meanings.sent3: The scenic wallpaper made the room feel like a magical forest.
meanings.sent4: His scenic photographs transformed ordinary scenes into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The scenic backdrop of the play transported the audience to another world.
